$WmMPID_ミカヤ,ch11_01_Micaiah_F_Normal,Face|If we wish to promote an
understanding between nations
and a cultural exchange...$k$pa mock battle is an option, isn't it?$k$p$WmMPID_サナキ,ch09_01_Sanaki_F_Normal,Face|Although it may be under a different
banner, it is deeply moving to keep
my promise to my sister in this way.$k$pI refuse to lose!$k$p$WmMPID_漆黒の騎士,ch09_08_BlackNight_M_Normal,Face|Should I be here? Should I yet live?
Is this another miracle?$k$p
